嶜字的基本解释

嶜
qín
〔嶜崟（
y妌 ）〕高峻；险峻，如“玉石嶜嶜，眩耀青荧。”

嶜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jīn］
［《集韻》咨林切，平侵，精。］
(1)见“嶜岑”。
(2)见“嶜崟”。

嶜字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶜； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页320第01
【廣韻】昨淫切【集韻】咨林切【類篇】才淫切，?音梣。嶜嵒，高銳貌。【揚雄·羽獵賦】玉石嶜崟。【張衡·南都賦】幽谷嶜岑，夏含霜雪。【註】嶜岑，峻極貌。　又【集韻】集荏切，音坅。嶜碞，山貌。

嶜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嶜字的起名意思

高峻；险峻，如“玉石嶜嶜，眩耀青荧。”。

嶜
Basic explanation of words
嶜
qín
〔嶜崟(
y妌)] High and steep; steep, such as "The jade is swayed, dazzling and shining."
嶜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jīn］
["Jiyun" consulting Lin cut, flat invasion, fine. ]
(1) See "嶜cen".
(2) See "嶜崟".
嶜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶜; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 320 No. 01
[Guang Yun] Yesterday's lustful cut [Ji Yun] Consultation Lin's cut [Category] Only lewd cut,? Yin 梣. Jiyan, high-sharp appearance. 【Yang Xiong·Feather Hunting Fu】Jade and stone 嶜崟. [Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu] Yougu Zhangcen, Xia Hanshuangxue. [Note] Shu Cen, extremely magnificent appearance.　 [Ji Yun] Ji Lun cut, sound.嶜碞, mountain appearance.
